meanings.sent3: The hiddenness of the missing sock was blamed on the mischievous dog.
meanings.sent4: The hiddenness of the rare flower in the forest was like a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The hiddenness of the secret passage in the castle was finally revealed by the brave knight.
